jobDescription: The candidate will be required to work with a team in order to provide a fully functioning Cloud architecture and other support requirements as deemed necessary by the government entities. We will be providing Enterprise Cloud Support Services using AWS and Microsoft Azure software, infrastructure, and platform subscriptions which allow online software, infrastructure, and platform access. Our company will be required to provide the ability to provide partner applications, 24/7 technical call center, professional labor to support the Cloud (training, full-time daily support operations, and consultation and support), and Cloud-based digital/media asset management system.Required SkillsRequired Skills: Provides recommendations and support to ensure scalable analytics solutions capable of combining potential risk indicators and developing leads.Performs analysis of data to analyze usage and trends.Reports results and issues.Performs other tasks as assigned by the COR. Required ExperienceExperience:o Two years of experience providing data analysis support.Certifications:Preferred: IAT-II (one of the following): CCNA Security, CySA+, GICSP, GSEC, Security+CE or SSCP or higher.Clearance:Secret with an IT-II (requires a minimum of an interim Secret) Job Location  Fort Meade, US-MD
